response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us and is tailored to meet your needs perfectly. Considering its worth to us and its significance to you, we're offering it to you at a special price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that could potentially be worth $10,000 to you, at a competitive rate. We believe this offer will not only benefit you financially but also align with our shared goals of mutual success. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
